EmailTemplate.name: 12-08-22 BNK Connect Webinar Thank You Email.BNK Connect Webinar Thank You Email
EmailTemplate.subject: CONNECT Security Webinar Replay
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Thank you for your interest in our CONNECT webinar series. In our recent session,our security experts discussed the latest trends and insights in logical ATM attacks and highlighted the importance of following valuable rules to keep your ATM network safe. Want to watch it again? Click below to listen to the recording. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> We look forward to welcoming you to our next CONNECT Webinar.
